casebody.data:
STATE of North Carolina
v.
Rayford Clyde HENDRIX. No. 366P04. Supreme Court of North Carolina. December 2, 2004. Rayford C. Hendrix, Pro Se. William P. Hart, Special Deputy Attorney General, Garry W. Frank, District Attorney, for State.

ORDER

Upon consideration of the petition filed by Defendant on the 21st day of July 2004 in this matter for a writ of certiorari to review the order of the North Carolina Court of Appeals, the following order was entered and is hereby certified to the North Carolina Court of Appeals:

"Dismissed by order of the Court in conference, this the 2nd day of December 2004."
